title: The Harvest Home
verses: Though in the outward church below, The
wheat and tares togeth-er grow; Je-sus ere long will
weed the crop, And pluck the trees in an-ger up.
For soon the reap-ing time will come,
And an-gels shout the har-vest home.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Based on Jesus' parable of wheat and tares, anticipating final harvest
